com.blukii.sdk.config

Class SmartKey.OnConnectionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blukii.sdk.config.Blukii.OnConnectionListener
      • com.blukii.sdk.config.SmartKey.OnConnectionListener
  • Enclosing class:
    SmartKey

    public abstract static class SmartKey.OnConnectionListener
extends Blukii.OnConnectionListener

    Abstract class for callbacks of SmartKey specific requests.

    The callbacks are additionally provided to the callbacks of base class Blukii.OnConnectionListener.

      • onInitiateSmartKeyAuthentification

        public void onInitiateSmartKeyAuthentification(boolean success,
                                               byte status)
        Callback for request SmartKey.initiateAuthentication().

        See SmartKey.initiateAuthentication() for more information.
        Parameters:
        success - true, if authentication is successful
        status - response status, can be one of the REQUEST_STATUS_... fields of class Blukii

      • onReadSmartKeyButton

        public void onReadSmartKeyButton(boolean pushed,
                                 byte status)
        Callback for request SmartKey.readButton().
        Parameters:
        pushed - true, if SmartKey is actually pushed
        status - response status, can be one of the REQUEST_STATUS_... fields of class Blukii

      • onReadSmartKeyCommandSet

        public void onReadSmartKeyCommandSet(int commandSet,
                                     byte status)
        Callback for request SmartKey.readSmartKeyCommandSet().

        The response value commandSet is a bitwise summary that determines the available SmartKey requests.

        Use the following constants for detecting the available states:
        • SmartKey.COMMANDSET_COMMON
        • SmartKey.COMMANDSET_MODE
        • SmartKey.COMMANDSET_AUTHENTICATION
        • SmartKey.COMMANDSET_PAIRING_MODE
        • SmartKey.COMMANDSET_SECURE_MODE
        • SmartKey.COMMANDSET_BUTTON
        Parameters:
        commandSet - bitwise summary value for available requests concerning SmartKey
        status - response status, can be one of the REQUEST_STATUS_... fields of class Blukii

      • onReadSmartKeyMode

        public void onReadSmartKeyMode(int mode,
                               byte status)
        Callback for request SmartKey.readMode().

        Retrieves the SmartKey security mode. This can be one of the following constants
        • SmartKey.SETTING_MODE_ERROR
        • SmartKey.SETTING_MODE_OFF
        • SmartKey.SETTING_MODE_CONVENIENCE
        • SmartKey.SETTING_MODE_PAIRING
        • SmartKey.SETTING_MODE_SECURE_PREPARED
        • SmartKey.SETTING_MODE_SECURE
        Parameters:
        mode - SmartKey security mode.
        status - response status, can be one of the REQUEST_STATUS_... fields of class Blukii
